insert-new-channel-mixer: INSERT INTO channels (channel_id, user_id, token, user_avatar_url, banner_url, vods_enabled, description, language, date_joined, date_first_scraped, social, verified, audience) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
update-channel-mixer: UPDATE channels SET token=?, user_avatar_url=?, banner_url=?, vods_enabled=?, description=?, language=?, social=?, verified=?, audience=? WHERE channel_id={channel_id};
